library(tidyverse) 

imdb <- imdb %>%
  select(Genre, Year, Votes)

imdbClean <- imdb %>%
  separate(Genre, c('Genre', 'Genre1', 'Genre2'), ',') 

imdbCleanTest <- imdbClean %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(1:3), names_to = 'Random', values_to = 'Genre') 


imdbCleanTest <- imdbCleanTest %>%
  select(Genre, Year, Votes)
